A Hard Day's Night

Ano: 1964

IMDb ID: tt0058182

Classificação: 7.5

Sinopse: A day-and-a-half in the life of the Fab Four leading up to a televised concert gig. The lads are constantly on the run, from their crazed fans and from their manager, who is constantly trying to rein them in. However, Ringo is arrested and still isn't in the studio a half-hour before air time. With Paul's grandfather available for additional comical relief, the group performs a dozen or so songs.—garykmcd
